students.name: Alexander K.
students.comment: 0: A100 matched me up with a job as a web developer at MEA mobile.

students.name: Tom Sonnemann
students.comment: 1: I joined the A100 Program to supplement my CS degree from Southern with some experience building real-world projects and to find an awesome company to join. After a successful apprenticeship with Independent Software, I'm now working as a full time developer.

students.name: Victor Mutai
students.comment: 2: Through A100, my teamwork, coding, and communication skills have improved immensely.

students.name: John Devivo
students.comment: 3: A100 is teaching me the skills I need to succeed as a software engineer.

partners.name: Ted Yang
partners.comment: 1: Connecticut can fund startups; we can offer them places to work. We can do all that, but if we don't have developers, we're going nowhere. The A100 Program provided me with a great Apprentice, whom I hired immediately after his apprenticeship.
partners.more: a founder of MediaCrossing in Stamford, a digital media trading company.
